quote: Without honor, victory is hollow.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Better to die with honor than live with shame.
author: Tacitus

quote: Honor is simply the morality of superior men.
author: H.L. Mencken

quote: You cannot believe in honor until you have achieved it.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: The most tragic thing in the world is a man of genius who is not a man of honor.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: If it be a sin to covet honor, I am the most offending soul alive.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: It is better to deserve honors and not have them than to have them and not deserve them.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Honor is like a match: you can only use it once.
author: Marcel Pagnol

quote: A true man of honor feels humbled himself when he cannot help humbling others.
author: Robert E. Lee

quote: The shortest and surest way to live with honor in the world is to be in reality what we would appear to be.
author: Socrates

quote: One's sense of honor is the only thing that cannot be taken from you unless you surrender it.
author: John D. MacDonald

quote: No person was ever honored for what he received. Honor has been the reward for what he gave.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Honor is the inner sense of a man that compels him to do the right thing, even if no one is watching.
author: General Douglas MacArthur

quote: He has honor if he holds himself to an ideal of conduct though it is inconvenient, unprofitable, or dangerous to do so.
author: Walter Lippmann

quote: The louder he talked of his honor, the faster we counted our spoons.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Honor is not in titles and honors, but in doing what is right.
author: Seneca

quote: Death is nothing, but to live defeated and without glory is to die every day.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: You cannot dream yourself into a character; you must hammer and forge yourself one.
author: James A. Froude

quote: True honor is to be found in doing one’s duty well.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Act well your part, there all the honor lies.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: The measure of a man's real character is what he would do if he knew he never would be found out.
author: Thomas Babington Macaulay

quote: Keep your honor bright. You may lose everything else, but never lose your honor.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: He who lives without discipline dies without honor.
author: Icelandic Proverb

quote: Better a life of honor than a life of ease.
author: Aesop

quote: A man of honor should never forget what he is because he sees what others are.
author: Baltasar Gracián

quote: The sense of honor is of so fine and delicate a nature that even a breath can wound it.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: The man who has no sense of honor is not truly alive.
author: Plautus

quote: True honor is always humble.
author: Patrick Henry

quote: Honor is like an island, rugged and without a beach; once we have left it, we can never return.
author: Nicolas Boileau

quote: There is no honor in being superior to your fellow man; true honor is being superior to your former self.
author: Ernest Hemingway
